LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.Configure.Field.SliderNavigationId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the slider navigation type which will be displayed on all sliders for navigation.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.List.SearchEndDateUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The end date for the search.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.List.SearchWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Search by a specific widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.Published.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to publish this slider picture (visible in store). Uncheck to unpublish (slider picture not available in store).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.SliderPictureName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the slider picture.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.WidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose widget zones where to display this slider picture.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.DesktopPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a picture to display on desktop slider. If the picture size exceeds your stores max image size setting, it will be automatically resized.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.MobilePicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a picture to display on mobile slider. If the picture size exceeds your stores max image size setting, it will be automatically resized.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.RedirectUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter redirect URL with HTTPS. Leave empty if you don't want this picture to be clickable.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.OpenInNewTab.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to open the redirect url in a new tab.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.AlternateText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Override "alt" attribute for "img" HTML element. If empty, then a default rule will be used (e.g. slider picture name).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.Comment.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter title for picture. Leave empty if you don't want to display any text.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.StartDateUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The start date of the creation of slider picture in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.EndDateUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The end date of the creation of slider picture in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.AclCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one or several customer roles i.e. administrators, vendors, guests, who will be able to see this slider picture. If you don't need this option just leave this field empty. In order to use this functionality, you have to disable the following setting: Configuration > Catalog settings > Ignore ACL rules (sitewide).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.LimitedToStores.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Option to limit this slider picture to a certain store. If you have multiple stores, choose one or several from the list. If you don't use this option just leave this field empty. In order to use this functionality, you have to disable the following setting: Configuration > Catalog settings > Ignore "limit per store" rules (sitewide).

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Updated
LocaleResource.Value: The slider picture has been updated successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Deleted

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.DesktopPicture.Notification

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.MobilePicture.Notification
LocaleResource.Value: If no mobile picture is uploaded then the desktop picture will be visible. otherwise, visible on mobile.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.Configure.Fields.CacheWidgets.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to cache slider pictures. It can significantly improve performance. But slider pictures with StartDate or EndDate will not work.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.SmartSlider.SliderPicture.Fields.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Display order of the picture in slider in case of multiple pictures. 1 represents the top of the list.
